amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Corps of Engineers construction account by $481,186,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce appropriation for construction including recession of funds by $481,186,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 351 (Roll no. 503).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Westmoreland.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 351 (Roll no. 503).
